CustomField.formula: IF( AND(NOT(ISBLANK( Date_Response_to_Sales__c )),Date_Response_to_Sales__c <= Response_Target_Timeframe__c),'Inside SLA', IF( AND(ISBLANK( Date_Response_to_Sales__c ),NOW() <= Response_Target_Timeframe__c),'Inside SLA', IF( AND(NOT(ISBLANK( Date_Response_to_Sales__c )),Date_Response_to_Sales__c >= Response_Target_Timeframe__c),'Outside SLA', IF( AND(ISBLANK( Date_Response_to_Sales__c ),NOW() >= Response_Target_Timeframe__c),'Outside SLA',''))))
CustomField.label: Response Timeframe SLA
